titles.title: A bill to provide for an exemption for certain United States flag ships from radio operator and equipment requirements.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4633)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to exempt a U.S. ship operating in accordance with the Global Maritime Distress and Safety System provisions of the Safety Convention from radio operator and equipment requirements.
